title: Design Thinking-Based Techno-Management Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational design thinking concepts, awareness of IT business environments, and familiarity with basic business communication terminology
context.additional_context: MBA-ITBM integrated program including language domain case studies. Analysis of technical documentation, presentation skills, and multicultural team communication strategies.

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to develop user personas and empathy maps reflecting diverse stakeholders' language patterns.
Perform cross-functional idea generation processes using collaboration tools at least three times and optimize verbal expressions.
Acquire the ability to develop and validate design solution prototypes applying quantitative/qualitative evaluation metrics and analyze user feedback text.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
